archimate:TechnologyService.name: Renewal Service (IRS)
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Motor (or Home) Intelligent Renewal Emails (MIRE & HIRE respectively) display system generated enquiries which are generated 11 months after a customer's initial enquiry. These MIRE and HIRE enquiries are marked with a source code of MQI and HQI respectively.
There is also an MSM_ENERGY channel for TED (Tariff End Date) and EIF (Energy Intelligent Follow-Up) processes.
